TopicTitle: [1.12] [Kopernicus] Dres To Eve - A simple mod to expand the Eve system. (1.0)

Articles.Content:
Dres is... for a lack of a better word, boring. It's just a smaller Mun that orbits the Sun.  So I decided to actually give one simple reason to go there: amazing views.

Changes provided by mod:

  • Dres no longer orbits the Sun, but is now a moon of Eve. Like most moons, Dres is now tidally locked.
  • Dres now has rings because being another plain old moon is still boring. The rings are inclined nearly 17 degrees to Dres' equator.
  • Science values for Dres have been tweaked to be a little bit higher.
  • Due to the Orbit of Dres now crossing Gilly's stock orbit, Gilly has been moved into a more circular and higher orbit.
  • Gilly is in a 1:4 resonance with Dres now,  so Dres orbits 4 times in the time it takes Gilly to orbit once.
  • Eve now rotates nearly 2 times for each time Dres orbits once.

Download page

Requirements: Kopernicus

How to install:

  1.  Download the zip folder labeled "DresToEve".
  2. Unzip the folder.
  3. Drag the contents of the unzipped folder to your gamedata folder (This will tell you how to locate it)
  4. That should be it, once you start up KSP and go to tracking station view you should see Dres in orbit around Eve.
